name: Eremite Crossbow
description: A member of a loosely-organized mercenary corps hailing from a place where the sands shine like gold. Will work for anyone as long as the pay is good.\nThe Eremite tradition is to use bows to engage their foes, but ever since the Akademiya permitted them to buy crossbows at the bazaars, only the proudest shooters would still use bows, which take many years of practice to master.
